biotools.summary: CLASTR, the Cellosaurus STR similarity search tool enables users to compare one or more STR profiles with those available in the Cellosaurus cell line knowledge resource. It aims to help researchers in the process of cell line authentication and detecting potential contamination and misidentification cases.
